ossia

Open Software System for Interactive Applications

A free and open-source intermedia sequencer


Enables precise and flexible scripting of interactive scenarios.
Control and score any OSC-compliant software or hardware: Max/MSP, PureData, openFrameworks, Processing…

  • Download ossia score

Multi-protocol sequencer

Remote-control various applications, such as Max/MSP, PureData, Processing, openFrameworks, Unity3D, modul8, Live… using OSC, Minuit and more to come.

Flexible time management

Set temporal & conditional relationships between events, interactively trigger them, hierarchize your score, and use loops to produce interactive scenarios.

Interpolation & breakpoint functions

Automatically interpolate parameters’ values between events or draw your own curved breakpoint function. Map addresses together, and live-script your score using JavaScript.

Carousel - Blue Yeti
Nebula - Les Baltazars
Quarrè- Pierre Cochard
